text: Nappy Boy is an American record label founded by R&B; and hip hop artist T-Pain.Patterson, Katie. T-Pain: Hard&B;'s Rappa Ternt Sanga , VIBE. Published April 3, 2006. Retrieved October 15, 2009. The label is distributed by RCA Records, and formerly by Jive Label Group. The label's roster of artists includes Gym Class Heroes front man Travie McCoy, Young Cash, Sixxmann, Mandel (Manny G), and Lil Westside. In May 2008, T-Pain announced that he would like to turn Nappy Boy Entertainment into a new business venture which would turn his company digital, by releasing albums and songs online via iTunes. The new venture, Nappy Boy Digital, focuses on albums and songs released as downloads and ringtones, with few physical releases.T-Pain Calls Out Copycats, Plans Going Fully Digital , HipHopDX.com. Published May 21, 2008.T-Pain Busy With Production, Label, Touring, Billboard. Published 2008. Retrieved October 15, 2009. Featured in the Nappy Boy logo is the Florida State Capitol representing Tallahassee, Florida, where T-Pain was born. ==Artists== * T-Pain (Nappy Boy/RCA Records) * Tay Dizm * Joey Galaxy (formerly known as "Young Cash" until 2010)http://www.xxlmag.com/rap-music/new-music/2014/01/premiere-t-pain- featuring-waka-flocka-flame-rich-homie-quan-young-cash-fuck-em/ * Travie McCoy (Nappy Boy/Decaydance/Atlantic) * Shawnna * Field Mob * Brandon Watson * Profit Dinero * Piao ==Former artists== * Jay Lyriq * Sophia Fresh * One Chance * Shay Mooney ==Producers== * L.a Chase *Young Fyre * Bishop Jones ==Albums released on label== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |+ Albums released on Nappy Boy Entertainment label !
